snippet: China's leaders underscored their support for Hong Kong's unpopular leader as he visited Beijing on Friday in the wake of pro-democracy protests in the southern Chinese city....

headline.print_headline: Chinese Leaders Reiterate Support for HK Leader
headline.main: Chinese Leaders Reiterate Support for HK Leader

lead_paragraph: China's leaders underscored their support for Hong Kong's unpopular leader as he visited Beijing on Friday in the wake of pro-democracy protests in the southern Chinese city.
